timeline.author: LinoxGH

replies.bodyText:
I think this is a bit messy. Maybe create a variable of inv.addItem().get() and then check if it's null. I don't quite understand how checking if the inventory is empty can duplicate the item though.

addItem is adding the item, and returns the results. If it tried to add 64 of an item, but only 28 of it could be added, it would return the item with an amount of 36. If you only check if it's empty, and you drop the original item (the 64 one), you drop 64, however 28 were already deposited. Aka, the items was duped.
Instead of checking why the PR is not good, just accept it lmao
It's such a simple additional, I don't understand why you keep refusing to accept it
